Class AnnotationEnforcer

java.lang.Object
  org.ehoffman.testing.testng.ExtensibleTestNGListener
      org.ehoffman.testng.extensions.AnnotationEnforcer
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.testng.IInvokedMethodListener, org.testng.IMethodInterceptor, org.testng.ITestListener, org.testng.ITestNGListener
Deprecated. please extend ExtensibleTestNGListener and call the ExtensibleTestNGListener#setInterceptors(List) in a static block. 

public class AnnotationEnforcer
extends ExtensibleTestNGListener

Author:
rexhoffman

Field Summary
protected static String[] integration_test_groups

protected static List<String> validGroups
          Deprecated. contains the union of AnnotationTransformer#unit_test_groups and AnnotationTransformer#integration_test_groups, with an additional element of AnnotationTransformer#validation_test_group
